languages.text: "Роскошь... Как часто высокопоставленные преступники прячутся за ней, как за броней. Вот только арбитры равнодушны к золоту во всех его проявлениях".
languages.translation_comment:
Inside the palace on Janus.
Cassia: "What a splendid estate! I have seen picts of our ancient manors in the House Orsellio archives — this place is very similar."

traits.locale_text: "Роскошь... Как часто высокопоставленные преступники прячутся за ней, как за броней. Вот только арбитры равнодушны к золоту во всех его проявлениях".

languages.text: "Luxury... The number of times I have seen lofty criminals use it like armour. What they fail to realise is that Arbitrators are indifferent to gold in all its forms."
languages.translation_comment:
Inside the palace on Janus.
Cassia: "What a splendid estate! I have seen picts of our ancient manors in the House Orsellio archives — this place is very similar."
languages.original_text: "Роскошь... Как часто высокопоставленные преступники прячутся за ней, как за броней. Вот только арбитры равнодушны к золоту во всех его проявлениях".

traits.locale_text: "Luxury... The number of times I have seen lofty criminals use it like armour. What they fail to realise is that Arbitrators are indifferent to gold in all its forms."

"Luxury... The number of times I have seen lofty criminals use it like armour. What they fail to realise is that Arbitrators are indifferent to gold in all its forms."

languages.text: 「贅沢か…それを鎧のようにまとう高慢な犯罪者どもを、これまで何度も見てきました。ですが、彼らが理解していないのは、アービトレイターはあらゆる形の黄金に無関心だということです」
languages.original_text: "Luxury... The number of times I have seen lofty criminals use it like armour. What they fail to realise is that Arbitrators are indifferent to gold in all its forms."

traits.locale_text: 「贅沢か…それを鎧のようにまとう高慢な犯罪者どもを、これまで何度も見てきました。ですが、彼らが理解していないのは、アービトレイターはあらゆる形の黄金に無関心だということです」

languages.text: "Luxus ... Wie oft ich erlebt habe, dass hochfliegende Verbrecher ihn wie eine Rüstung nutzen. Ihnen ist nur eines nicht klar: Arbitratoren ist Gold in all seinen Formen vollkommen gleichgültig."
languages.original_text: "Luxury... The number of times I have seen lofty criminals use it like armour. What they fail to realise is that Arbitrators are indifferent to gold in all its forms."

traits.locale_text: "Luxus ... Wie oft ich erlebt habe, dass hochfliegende Verbrecher ihn wie eine Rüstung nutzen. Ihnen ist nur eines nicht klar: Arbitratoren ist Gold in all seinen Formen vollkommen gleichgültig."

languages.text: « Ah, le luxe... Je ne compte plus le nombre de fois où j'ai vu des criminels haut placés s'en servir comme une armure. Ce qu'ils ne comprennent jamais, c'est que les arbitrators n'ont que faire de l'or, sous quelque forme que ce soit. »
languages.original_text: "Luxury... The number of times I have seen lofty criminals use it like armour. What they fail to realise is that Arbitrators are indifferent to gold in all its forms."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, le luxe... Je ne compte plus le nombre de fois où j'ai vu des criminels haut placés s'en servir comme une armure. Ce qu'ils ne comprennent jamais, c'est que les arbitrators n'ont que faire de l'or, sous quelque forme que ce soit. »

languages.text: «Cuánto lujo... La de veces que habré visto a criminales de postín valerse del lujo como si fuese una armadura. Lo que no comprenden es que los Arbitrator son indiferentes al oro en todas sus formas».
languages.original_text: "Luxury... The number of times I have seen lofty criminals use it like armour. What they fail to realise is that Arbitrators are indifferent to gold in all its forms."

traits.locale_text: «Cuánto lujo... La de veces que habré visto a criminales de postín valerse del lujo como si fuese una armadura. Lo que no comprenden es que los Arbitrator son indiferentes al oro en todas sus formas».

languages.text: “奢侈做派……我亲眼见过很多次，那些身居高位的犯人把他们的奢侈做派当成盔甲，但他们没意识到，法务官对一切形式的金钱都漠不关心。”
languages.original_text: "Luxury... The number of times I have seen lofty criminals use it like armour. What they fail to realise is that Arbitrators are indifferent to gold in all its forms."

traits.locale_text: “奢侈做派……我亲眼见过很多次，那些身居高位的犯人把他们的奢侈做派当成盔甲，但他们没意识到，法务官对一切形式的金钱都漠不关心。”

languages.text: "Şatafat... Kibirli suçluların bunu zırh gibi kuşandıklarına o kadar çok şahit oldum ki. Asla anlayamadıkları şey şu ki Yargıcılar, altının her türlüsüne kayıtsızdır."
languages.original_text: "Luxury... The number of times I have seen lofty criminals use it like armour. What they fail to realise is that Arbitrators are indifferent to gold in all its forms."

traits.locale_text: "Şatafat... Kibirli suçluların zırh gibi kuşandıklarına o kadar şahit oldum ki. Asla anlayamadıkları şey şu ki Yargıcılar, altının her türlüsüne kayıtsızdır."

languages.original_text: "Luxury... The number of times I have seen lofty criminals use it like armour. What they fail to realise is that Arbitrators are indifferent to gold in all its forms."
